title: Bug 35915Need a locale String from FontData
description: 2.1We need a way to get the Locale information so that it can be displayed. OnMotif the FontDialog is laid out in such a way that the encoding looks likethe name and as a result it looks to the user like we have not displayedanything. We need to be able to display this value in the FontPreferencePage.Something like getLocaleValue() would be fine.
